entry.title: Current Conditions: 4.5°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: North East Margaree 01:00 AM AST Saturday 24 December 2022
Temperature: 4.5°C
Pressure / Tendency: 100.7 kPa falling
Humidity: 87 %
Dewpoint: 2.5°C
Wind: ENE 18 km/h gust 41 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Friday night: Rain. Temperature rising to 11 by morning.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Rain beginning this evening except snow over the Highlands this evening. Risk of freezing rain this evening. Risk of thundershowers overnight. Rainfall amount 10 to 15 mm. Wind southeast 60 km/h gusting to 90 except gusting to 170 from Margaree Harbour to Bay St. Lawrence late this evening and overnight. Temperature rising to 11 by morning. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Saturday: Rain. Temperature falling to plus 3 in the afternoon.
entry.summary: Rain ending in the morning then a mix of sun and cloud. Wind southeast 60 km/h gusting to 90 except gusting to 140 from Margaree Harbour to Bay St. Lawrence early in the morning. Wind becoming southwest 40 gusting to 60 in the morning. Temperature falling to plus 3 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Saturday night: Partly cloudy. Low zero.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Wind southwest 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low zero. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Friday 23 December 2022
